detail_desc: Imitation leather chukka boots with a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Mittens in a soft knit with a front flap that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Jacket in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a decorative scalloped trim around the neckline, press-stud on one shoulder and overlocked edges at the cuffs.
Knee-length cycling shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a key pocket in the waistband. Unlined.
Short top in a crinkled viscose weave with lace details. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a wrapover front and an elasticated hem.

prod_name: Sanne bustier LS s.0 fast buy
detail_desc: Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a seam under the bust.
Long-sleeved, patterned jumper in fine-knit cotton with narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Rounded hem, longer at the back.

Ankle-length jeans in sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud and tapered legs with a tab and metal buckle at the ankles. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Hooded jumper in a soft, fine knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Top in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and gathered seams to create added volume and soft draping.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, high slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, side seams, cuffs and hem.
Large scarf in a soft weave with short fringes along the edges.
Short, wide blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Trims down the side seams and around the hem.

Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a text print on the front.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Brushed inside.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a lightly sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips.
Earrings with sparkly stones and beads. Length 5.5 cm.
Knitted mittens with sparkly stones, ribbed cuffs and a front flap that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Slip-on loafers in velvet with decorative embroidery on the uppers. Quilted satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Hat in a sturdy, rib-knit cotton blend with a wide turned-up hem.

Set with a hooded top and joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit containing alpaca wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Washed cotton twill joggers in a relaxed style with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, welt back pockets, and slightly lower crotch. Tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees and elasticated hems. Regular fit.

Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in linen jersey with a deep V-neck and short cap sleeves.
Top in soft jersey with short sleeves.

Long dress in jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck, short cap sleeves, a seam with draping at the waist and a high slit at the back. Unlined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a small stand-up collar. Zip down the front, diagonal, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Ribbed turtle neck with a small frill trim, a small frill trim at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and seams at the waist and on the skirt for added width. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lace hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
